RHighlight.p: Chilling by the pool with a cold glass of wine, a good friend and a good book, after a hard day browsing the galleries and restaurants of Ubud. Heaven!

RSurroundArea.p:
Ubud is full of great places for eating, drinking, singing and dancing.
Start with Happy Hour Mojitos at Cinta Grill on Jalan Monkey Forest, then try the huge wanton soup next door at Laughing Buddha while listening to some fabulous blues. Or skittle over to Havana Restaurant on Jalan Dewi Sita to dance some salsa with one of the wait staff and munch on Havana’s delicious authentic Cuban black beans. All only a ten-minute walk away from Villa San.
And for a unique Ubud experience, walk to the bottom of the dragon steps in the Monkey Forest, and visit the little temple by the river running below. (Don’t take anything edible with you, or the monkeys will sniff it and you’ll lose your bag). Then, take the best part of two days to learn mask carving from third generation Master Carver Wayan (Peter Pan) on Jalan Gootama. (a five-minute walk from the villa).
Adventure seekers can go a little further afield for white water tubing or trekking with Ubud Sports Adventure (30 minutes by car). Either way, you’ll see parts of the beautiful Bali countryside you’d never have known was there.

ROverallComments.p:
To be this close to the centre of vibrant Ubud but be surrounded by so much space, peace and comfort is a rare treat. Returning to the sanctuary of Villa San’s impressively long lap pool, lovely lawn and big comfy bedrooms and bathrooms after a hard day’s shopping or sight-seeing in and around Ubud was a delight. We were royally looked after by the lovely staff, who were keen to make sure that we enjoyed our stay and equally keen to share their knowledge of the area and the culture and customs of this lovely part of the island.
The master suite gets top marks for luxury, comfort and sheer quality. There are no TVs in the bedrooms (they get points for that, from us) but there are excellent TV/DVD/music systems in the two entertainment rooms and a smaller set, plus electronic games console , in the playroom. Bring your own DVDs though, as the owner’s collection is pretty small. Ditto iPods for the docks in every bedroom.
The villa is well-equipped for young children and extended families with three twin-bedded rooms and a great playroom. Having all the accommodation on one level is also be a big plus for guests that have trouble with steps.
The cool shady balé at the top end of the swimming pool is big enough to seat everyone, even where there’s a full house, and with Bose speakers installed in the rafters it makes the perfect place to chill out, enjoy the tropical scene and thank your lucky stars that you are staying at Villa San.
Oh yes, and we couldn’t help but imagine what an absolutely lovely place Villa San would be – marquee on the lawn, glass of Champagne in the hand, music drifting through the balmy evening air – for a casual wedding reception or other special celebration!

RUnpleasantSurprise.p:
While we found most of the artwork at the villa appealing, there were a few pieces that surprised us … then perhaps that is the intention!
There’s a small studio room above the living pavilion – accessed via a very steep spiral staircase near the pool – but we’d suggest that children are not encouraged to explore up there as it’s a bit of a safety hazard. A ‘gym’ room lies between the master suite and the ‘Luke’ suite bedrooms, but at the time of our inspection (November 2011) it was yet to be equipped.

REVIEW.Name: Anne Barry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa and the staff were absolutely wonderful. The rooms and bathrooms were luxurious and the pool was large and just the right temperature. A few more sun lounges around the pool would have been nice, but otherwise I can't fault Villa San in any way. A special thanks to Wayan Adi and all the staff, the chef, the driver, the security people and waiters - everyone was polite, helpful, and we couldn't have asked for anything better. Thank you for making our stay a holiday we will always remember.

REVIEW.Name: Niell Boustred
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great position, great facility, great team, really enjoyed the staff so consistently happy and committed. Everyone was prepared to go the extra mile to ensure we got the most out of our experience

REVIEW.Name: Samuel Griffiths
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa itself was stunning but what we were most impressed with was the excellent service from Mika and his team. They were attentive, flexible and made sure that everyone in our group had a magnificent time...I honestly cant praise them highly enough. With that said the villa itself is beautiful, spacious and very well designed. The location being so close to Central Ubud is also definitely worth considering as it offers a lot of flexibility.

REVIEW.Name: Sara Hoverstock
REVIEW.ROverallComments: thanks to all the staff for making our stay amazing! The location of this villa was perfect being in downtown Ubud- just steps away from the shops and rice terraces. The staff was completely attentive and made our stay perfect. We brought our 2 boys (3 & 5) and they were wonderful with them. Truely amazing experience!

REVIEW.Name: Heli Donaldson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is a marvellous villa for a family. The children have space and toys, while its easy to keep an eye on them. We found the staff went out of their way to assist us, the two Wayan's were marvellous with the little children, as were other staff. We ate most meals in, and the cook and others made delicious Indonesian meals, as well as kid specific requests and special treats. We enjoyed the walk to the rice fields nearby and found we walked into the main shopping area, which is close by, only a few times. Thanks everyone. We would love to return.

REVIEW.Name: Diane Laskowski
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A beautiful, serene and comfortable place to spend a few days in the company of family and friends. Food was amazing and great value. We had planned to eat out a lot but the house chef did such an amazing job we ate in every day!

REVIEW.Name: Rodney Robinson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful opportunity to spend relaxing time together, our second visit and felt like returning home. For friends travelling, it's vital to remember four people will get best rooms -it's not all equal in heaven.

REVIEW.Name: Roger Lee .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: You will not be disappointed with Villa San. We stayed to celebrate a family holiday with ages from 14 to 84. The Staff are outstanding and go above and beyond their duties to assist and help make sure you have an enjoyable stay. The bedrooms and bathrooms are comfortable modern clean and tidy. The grounds are just beautiful and so well kept. The massage service which comes to the Villa is reasonable with lovely staff. The location in Ubud is perfect, you can easily walk to the main areas. I would recommend this Villa to anyone wanting a Great Villa with a great location in Ubud. The staff are a credit and really make your stay.

REVIEW.Name: Severine Becker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing villa with such fantastic facilities and ideal location to discover Ubud and ils region. Definitly a place I would come back and recommend. We spent lovely days in Villa San with our friends and we would thank you for that. Hope to see you soon !

REVIEW.Name: Gail Shepherd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have just had the most fantastic family holiday at Villa San. Everything was perfect and the staff were outstanding. We would definitely recommend this villa and we look forward to returning in the future. Many thanks from the Shepherd/Curtis Family!

REVIEW.Name: Lindsey Duncan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic. Wonderful location, beautiful villa, lovely staff who were wonderful with our children. Highly recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Pauline Moore
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was fantastic - a little piece of serenity in a busy area. The staff were unobtrusive but did a great job and the chef produced some amazing meals. Our driver was great and explained a lot of things we would otherwise not have understood. We had a wonderful holiday and would not hesitate to recommend Villa San to anyone.

REVIEW.Name: Kerry Fullagar
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic villa for a group, staff were amazing and we felt very special to share Bali with them. They arranged my special birthday and shared some local Bali customs with us which made the evening more special. Bedrooms and bathrooms are very clean and luxurious and nothing was too much trouble for the staff.

REVIEW.Name: Elaine Ma
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our second time in 2 months staying at Villa San for a corporate retreat, and the bedroom configuration and public spaces makes it very conducive to holding meetings in the villa. There is a dedicated meeting room upstairs, but the seating areas were more than enough to hold meetings together and separately. It is a really conveniently located villa, a very short walk into the center of Ubud. What really stood out for us was the staff, no request was too much trouble, and the chef kept us well fed with delicious snacks during afternoon meetings and feasts for dinner, so we rarely had to venture out. Thank you to Mika, Kuta and all your staff for making us so welcome, we enjoyed it so much we are booking for a 3rd time in October.

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa staff are excellent and always have a smile. The villa itself is very well take care of and clean. The location is as good as it gets if you want to walk right down into Ubud center.

REVIEW.Name: Kim House
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful Villa!

REVIEW.Name: David Heron
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. While it's not the most spectacular villa - although it was excellent - the location is perfect, the staff were great, the food excellent, and our overall experience was exactly what we were looking for. The provision of a children's room, and lots of childrens films for the evenings when the adults were having dinner, meant the days passed very easily. The covered areas were ideal for a large group to enjoy a relaxed evening around the dinner table together. The staff were great, and really helped to make it an enjoyable stay.

REVIEW.Name: Barbro Hicks
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Absolute heaven!!!!

REVIEW.Name: Fiona Staples
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a great stay with you. Love you all. Thank you for the great service.

REVIEW.Name: Rashmi Sharma
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful! Service Excellent! A week in paradise. As regular visitors to Bali this has to be the best villas in Bali – surrounds, facilities, Chef, Staff, location. Thanks so much for a truly relaxing time and for putting up with all our generations – young to old. We will be back (if you will have us!).

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From all the 2 weeks I have stayed here I have had a blast. Thank you so much Ida (Adi), Mika, Kuta, Chef & Staff for making it all possible. This has been the best villa I have ever stayed at. Especially thanks to the Chef for preparing all of the meals, they were amazing. And another thanks to Kuda (Kuta) for taking us everywhere. We couldn’t have gone anywhere without you. And also another very big thanks to Ida (Adi) for serving us every morning & night & helping us when needed. And also for playing awesome music at night! Thanks for making this stay possible.

REVIEW.Name: Shu Wen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very good, friendly service. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Julie Grapengiessr-Seavill
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It’s been a great couple of days. Adi has been an exceptional host organizing an amazing bike tour with Eco Cycling and cooking class. We had fabulous massage on the lawn beside the pool and delicious meals. Great sound system for music. Nina has much enjoyed the playroom & we have all enjoyed the pool after our day adventures. Rainy swims have also been a highlight. The staff here are exceptional, the best so far, very attentive to every detail. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Kim Kelly
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic villa experience. Had the best time with friend, fantastic staff & a beautiful villa. Love Kuta our amazing driver who had patience for the girls shopping adventures & the kids singing all the way! Big thanks to Addi who smiled and laughed through every crazy request. Thank you everyone for making our stay so much FUN.

REVIEW.Name: Joan Grist
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A holiday to remember for a lifetime! Mika, Adi, Kuta and all the staff went to amazing lengths to make our eight nights in Villa San absolutely magical and perfectly relaxing. We were all especially taken by the beautiful decorations and the meal prepared on the last night for our mother’s 60th birthday celebration, and how patient and attentive all staff were towards the small children. This will be a holiday we brag about and remember fondly for many many years!

REVIEW.Name: Jessica O\'Sullivan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had an amazing holiday at Villa San. The staff have been fantastic. They have been so friendly and helpful. The food has been amazing !!! The room etc are very well presented. This is a fantastic spot to come with a young family. The toy room is just perfect. A huge thank you to all the staff. We will recommend the villa to our friend and we hope to be able to come back ourselves again sometime.

REVIEW.Name: Elise .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful 3 night stay to celebrate LL & Elise’s after wedding family gathering. We all had a wonderful stay and thank the staff for their 100% commitment to ensuring we had the best stay. Service & food were given to us with true enthusiasm ensuring no one went without. Kuta the safest driver in Bali, and most informative. We will recommend Villa San to all our friends.

REVIEW.Name: Tracy Tan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: One of the best villas I have stayed at in Bali. The ambience, the staff, the food, everything was perfect! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Villa San

REVIEW.Name: Nicole Ducler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: My family and I had a wonderful stay at Villa San. The villa and gardens are beautifully kept and very clean. The staff are amazing and couldn't do enough to please us. A very special thank you to Mika the manager who went out of his way to be helpful and even organized a beautiful dinner and decorations in the garden for my son-in-law's birthday. A big thank you to Adi for being so kind and amazing with the children who loved having him play with them and to Kuta who was always willing to drive us anywhere. We would definitely come back and would recommend this beautiful villa to anyone staying in Ubud as the place to be.

REVIEW.Name: Daniel + Mairav Whitten
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing. Highly recommended. Will be back

REVIEW.Name: BELLAVISTA DEMEURES DE CHARME BELLAVISTA DEMEURES DE CHARME
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful stay in Villa San. Everything is wonderful. Special thanks to Chef Delman. The meals were delicious. Thanks to Adi for all the recommendations and the attention he paid for us. Thanks to the driver Kuta, so kind. Well all the team was so great!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A truly magical stay at Villa San. Thank you sincerely for your warmth, hospitality, attentiveness and assistance. We couldn’t have asked for more. The surprise party for one our party was exceptional. The decoration, candles, set-up and Suckling Pig were incredible and led the birthday girl to exclaim ‘this is perfect”. We very much hope to return!

REVIEW.Name: Fal Guni
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing villa with superb staff, service & food. We all really enjoyed our stay here and couldn’t have been any better! Thank you Adi, Kuta, Chef, Mika & the crew for all your fantastic hospitality. Definitely will be back especially with a bag of Basmati Rice!

REVIEW.Name: Teresa Wibowo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have an amazing time here at Villa San. Weather was perfect, staff was very attentive. A great villa for everyone to relax & conduct a workshop, great yoga / meditation too. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one. Will try to be back and will recommend to others.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed in Villa San with our extended family. We all really appreciated the good service, the kind attention of the staff. The villa was amazing, very well appointed & clean. We really enjoy the Babi Guling night that was organized for us, the attention to detail, the decoration….Thank you also for spotting my sister’s Bday! Great cake and a nice surprise. We had an amazing time in Villa San! Thank You again.

REVIEW.Name: Ekow Duker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful! Wonderful! Wonderful!

REVIEW.Name: Shu Fen Huang
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for taking care of us!

REVIEW.Name: Helloworld Esperance on Andrew
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!! Beautiful place to switch off from the world…Quiet, peaceful, surreal, clean and gorgeous staff. We will return. Love you all.

REVIEW.Name: total bali Total Bali agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful place. The gentle loving staff and a brilliant cook. Will definitely recommend to friends visiting Ubud. Villa San is “Shangri La”, a beautiful heaven from the busy streets of Ubud. Beauty – Serenity – Gorgeous gardens, heavenly pool – wonderful service from delightful staff & delicious food. How about a 10/10 !!

REVIEW.Name: Michael Van Der Pol
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The family had a great time. The staff where very helpful and very good service. The food was beautiful. Would love to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Boma Hospitality
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our stay here so wonderful. This villa is an oasis in the middle of Ubud…. Peaceful, calm and surrounded by greenery. The staff were absolutely amazing. A big thank you to Adi for taking such wonderful care of us . He is a gem. We had 13 people with us and every single person has left very happy. THANK YOU VILLA SAN for making a birthday celebration even more special.

REVIEW.Name: Boma Hospitality
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our stay here so wonderful. This villa is an oasis in the middle of Ubud…. Peaceful, calm and surrounded by greenery. The staff were absolutely amazing. A big thank you to Adi for taking such wonderful care of us. He is a gem. We had 13 people with us and every single person has left very happy. THANK YOU VILLA SAN for making a birthday celebration even more special.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have enjoyed our stay here. Thank you for all of you.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Blyth
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To our wonderful hosts, we will miss your smiles and friendly hospitality!! Our stay was made very special right from the moment Mike greeted us on arrival. Made – what a great Chef you are. The food was delicious and tasty. Your omelette, also just amazing. Adi – your warm laughing way is much appreciate along with cocktails and everything else. Kuta, thank too for your help and nice conversation on our journeys around the area. Thanks to all the other staff who made the whole stay complete in every way. We look forward to the return trip.

REVIEW.Name: Marko Aalberg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything was excellent! Thank you. We will be back!

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A week of pure bliss. Awesome Time. Great Place to Stay. Best first experience in Bali. Could not have asked for kinder staff. Beautiful Villa, Beautiful Staff, Beautiful Food. I wish we could have stayed forever! Thank you. Each of you made our stay amazing and my 50th birthday super special.

REVIEW.Name: Zsuzsanna Tasnady
REVIEW.ROverallComments: VillaSan is wonderfully located in the heart of Ubud, the staff are extremely accommodating and helpful. Having the transport included with 8 hours a day of a driver was a bonus. We all enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it to anyone in a large group.

REVIEW.Name: Chrisiana .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We all had a wonderful time. The villa was the most luxurious & fantastic. We will certainly recommend it to others. Also the food was marvelous. Thanks to lovely staff for looking after us so well.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A very nice and clean villa. Staff very friendly and accommodating to our needs. We will highly recommend friends to come and stay. Thanks for the hospitality.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very nice staff and good for family gathering. The rooms are tidy and facilities are good. Home away home.

REVIEW.Name: Margaretha Bagger
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are a big family and loved our stay at Villa San. The friendly and most helpful staff, wonderful rooms and facilities and a perfect location in Ubud. A home away from home. We just loved our stay.

REVIEW.Name: Christien Santoso
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We enjoyed our stay and location is superb for Ubud, a distance enough from a crowded area but a walking distance from the center of Ubud. It is very private villa and enjoy the hospitality.

REVIEW.Name: MTA - Mobile Travel Agents
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful holiday place consist of a few things: Kind & Hard working Staff; Delicious and Filling Meals; Beautiful & Serene Environment; Comfortable & Luxurious Living Quarters; Enormous & Relaxing Pool. Villa San has all of these things.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: 10/10. What a fantastic place – the staff Adi, Kuta & Mika & Chef Made made us feel at home and looked after our every need. Thank you for a great week with amazing food. A special thank you to ADI for being the best at everything he does. Thank you for having our family stay at this wonderful villa, great memories, great staff. Can’t wait to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Jeremy Ong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent friendly attentive service. Thank you for looking after us.

REVIEW.Name: Lena Lena
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were very delighted to find such a beautiful and spacious villa so close to Ubud Centre! And to have the whole villa all to ourselves were just a godsend. The Villa Manager, Pak Wis and all the other staff members put their utmost effort to ensure your needs are met. They even organised a birthday cake for our friend! Couldn't have asked for a better service! Spa for 10 people all in the villa? No problemo! Pak Wis effortlessly organised all that for us while we went about doing other activities. We highly recommend this villa for any families or group of friends who want fuss free organising of activities for big groups. Thank you all for making our trip very memorable, and we will definitely come back and stay in the villa again!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Retreats Bali Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay in Villa San has been perfect in every way. The setting is wonderful and we were all able to meet together as a family of 11 for the first time in 6 years. The villa is a fantastic haven of peace and tranquility. We were so impressed with the staff – the gardener who keep the grounds so beautiful and the pool so clean; Delman and his kitchen team provided us with delicious food; Adi is an amazing butler who catered for our needs in a friendly way; Kuta was our star driver and nothing was too much trouble for him. He was pleasant and helpful in every way. What an excellent team they all are!! Our rooms were kept beautifully clean by all the cleaning staff and the security guys kept us safe at night. We thank you all!!

REVIEW.Name: One Network Solutions, Ltd - SELEQT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent a wonderful week at Villa San, the quality of the villa, the kindness of the staff. Each time we need something, you do your best to make us pleasure. Thank you for preparing us local excellent meals.

REVIEW.Name: Zoe Hart
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our week in Ubud so special. We will always remember your generosity and, kindness. What a magic place!. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is absolutely breathtaking and the staff are so nice! I really do love the architecture of the villa – amazing. Outdoor living and dining area. The pool is really nice and the whole villa is basically a tropical, peaceful paradise. Thanks so much to the amazing staff for the friendly smiles and awesome service!

REVIEW.Name: Claude Deschaintre
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa San is really 1st class villa with friendly staff. Special thanks to Adi who was very efficient and kept smiley even in some difficult situations.

REVIEW.Name: Fung Choi Yin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Happy Vacation @ Villa San. Enjoy the trip here and good service. Nice place!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa San, a lovely tranquil place, an oasis to return after the busy Ubud town.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Je t'aime
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely. Happiness, Pleasure, Peace and so on. Everything here is made for relaxing and enjoying life. Thank you for building this peace area in the middle of a Paradise Island. Thank you for taking so much care of your guests with sincerity and discretion. A frank, sincere and respectful thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful time here at Villa San. Thanks to everyone for making this stay very special for us !!!

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Perkins
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I stayed here with a group of friends for 10 days. The service is impeccable. The villas are a dream to stay in and the staff ensure that no request is too hard. Adi is our favorite – we want to take him home. Thank you for allowing us to enjoy all the beauty of Ubud and we hope one day we can come back.

REVIEW.Name: Katherine Gokavi-Whaley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa San was fantastic. The staff were amazing – so calm and friendly. It rubbed off on us all – especially the kids! Highly recommend the Pig! Thank you for the coffee in the morning. The beautiful food. Your help with the tailor. Picking us up from the top of the hill when were too hot to walk back. For all your care and attention during our stay. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Christine Plavina
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an awesome few days in this beautiful villa. It is gorgeous and very well maintained. However, the big differences between an awesome place and in our experience were the staff here. They were so welcoming, friendly, helpful and altogether outstanding. The villa is managed so well and thanks go to everyone who made our stay here so enjoyable. You are all delightful!

REVIEW.Name: Nadia Travaglini
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a perfect stay, Kuta, Adi, Mika, the Chef, and the three girls. We honestly could not suggest any improvements. It was the best place we have stayed - ever! Perfect for a group and family. Thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Anne Mccarthy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa San staff were excellent. Chef's excellent food, Adi excellent service. Great location, clean and tidy. Will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Ben Chow
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful villa and staff. Everything was taken care of for us and we don't have to worry about anything. This is an excellent family location for the future. Thank You.

REVIEW.Name: Nicholas Dorman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our stay at Villa San. It was very special. Thank you for everything. The staff was very welcoming, helpful and nice. We look forward to coming back someday in the future. Thank you again!

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa San staff were always happy, friendly and, helpful. All staff members went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. Amazing location close to town and activities. Villa rooms and ground are beautiful with space for children to play and parents to relax. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Ursina Kopp
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had such a great time, we loved the place, the location, the people! Everybody is so friendly and the staff even surprised my son with a birthday cake! Thank you so much!

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a very pleasant stay in Villa San. Helpful staff and very good food from the Chef. An oasis of peace in a busy city. Thanks for the great stay.

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for sharing this beautiful house. We have had such a wonderful time here celebrating our sons 21st birthday. Being so close to Ubud shopping and cafes. We didn’t need to travel far to find our days full. Staff here were superb and were at hand at all times without being obtrusive. I would highly recommend Villa San to others but probably will keep it as our own secret hideaway. Looking forward to our next visit.

REVIEW.Name: Nana Fatima Paturel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all staff of Villa San! You made our stay comfortable & enjoyable! The food was very good, staff were super and helpful, always with a smile! The villa is so beautiful, open and spacious garden, wow decorations, well furnished, lovely taste! It is Paradise in heaven, just seconds from the Ubud center, that is so jammed-picked. My family had a great time in Bali. We will surely come back. Love you all!!!

REVIEW.Name: Kathleen Brigidd Dryden
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a wonderful holiday here in Ubud. And will treasure our memories here for a very long time. The Balinese dancer and walk to the rice fields was a special treat. Thank you to all the team. We wish to return very soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Rose Property Bali Rose Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff are very nice and very good. We are very happy and having good time. And everything was perfect.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: An amazing place to relax, rejuvenate and connect with wonderful friends. The atmosphere and environs are second to none, the service and friendly nature of the staff superb. Adi – you a gem! So thoughtful and always so happy. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Karina Kho
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so very much for making our holiday such as lovely & memorable one. Service was beyond impeccable & everyone attended to our needs!. Villa was lovely, food was delicious. Thank you for the pool fencing to ensure safety for our very young children. Will highly recommend this place & hope to return in future. Thank you very much once again.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We really enjoy our stay. The service, the food and the smiles were perfect. We're looking forward to come back. A special thank you for Adi!

REVIEW.Name: Fiona Casey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All staff member went above and beyond to make our stay a special one, even our special request was attended very well. The meals were excellent, tasty and well presented. The villa is very quiet and peaceful and in great location.

REVIEW.Name: Mitchell Christopher Wilson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much!!! Everyone was so lovely and helpful especially Adi! Also the villa is so sooo beautiful. We have an amazing time.

REVIEW.Name: Liana Radzak
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We've had a wonderful time at the villa. Thank you for a memorable stay. We enjoyed every moment of it. Sampai ketemu lagi.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A BIG thank you to Mika, Adi and all of the Villa San staff for making our stay such a fantastic experience. No request was too difficult and we go home totally relaxed, satiated on the fantastic food, home to the reality that now have to make our own Gin Tonic, Vodka Fizz’s + other cocktails at the end of the day. Thank you to all the staff for your amazing service. We all had an amazing time in Ubud. We will highly recommend Villa San to our friends back in Australia. One last thank you – the Suckling Pig was not only delicious, but the effort that was made by the staff to decorate the villa and the tables was unbelievable!

REVIEW.Name: Keiht Albert Chivers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A most enjoyable 10 day stay, excellent staff and facilities and food. Many Thanks. A magnificent stay.

REVIEW.Name: Jereen Chua
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff was very good and well groomed. Very good and well presented food. The villa was clean and well maintained. Very good facilities. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Gregory James Incoll
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for taking care of us. A family of 10 is always a challenge and you managed us all very well. Food was great - thank you chef and team.

REVIEW.Name: Harriet Sondra Liroff
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I would like to thank all the staff, you went above and beyond making our trip even more amazing, you did an amazing job also handling our family!. Thank you for being so patient and kind to us all. There isn't a better place in Bali! Again, thanks so much.

REVIEW.Name: Pan Peter
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for excellent service. Kudos for the staff, they go extra miles to make our stay pleasant. The suckling pig dinner was memorable event! Will come back again. :)

REVIEW.Name: Seung Hwan Choi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa San is the heaven on earth. Our family truly enjoyed staying at Villa San. The three nights were the best days of the year. Especially the food was great and every staffs are very kind. We would recommend Villa San to our friends and families - must come back again someday. Thank You.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Adi, Kuta and all the WONDERFUL staff. You thoughtful, attentive, lovely people made our stay at this tranquil sanctuary. So very very special. All your recommendations for eating out, trips to the rice paddies and visiting the volcano were spot on. The massage afternoon here at the villa was great. But above all your smile and friendly face when we stepped back into this peaceful home away from home were so welcoming. Also the food was SENSATIONAL!. Thank you from the bottom of our heart.

REVIEW.Name: Stephen Francis Ward
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks to all @Villa San.

REVIEW.Name: Tree Thraisa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for all the little kind and thoughtful things you all did to make my 50th birthday the best ever!! Every single member of staff was kind, caring, professional, considerate, thoughtful. This was the BEST place we have EVER stayed in our lives!! THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU! We ABSOLUTELY will stay here again! It would be disappointing to stay anywhere else. We love Villa San. We will tell everybody and we will also Instagram #villasanubud.

REVIEW.Name: Raushanfikri Monoarfa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is really good. We love everything about the villa. We really feels at home. We also want to say thanks for the family that owns this villa, for creating a perfect villa that accommodates peace, zen, serenity and kids friendly compound.

REVIEW.Name: Pauline Thamgoh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We wish to thank you. The staff and manager of Villa San for your kindness and generosity during our wonderful stay here with you. The drivers were kind to us all and we will be recommending your skills and assistance to all we meet. A wonderful time shared by all here.

REVIEW.Name: Quentin Eric White
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so very much for making our stay so relaxing. This place is a little piece of paradise. The children had such a great time that they were happy not to leave the villa. A very special thank you for Evan's birthday surprise and gift. What a very touching and thoughtful memory for us. Thank you again and we hope to return again someday. Best wishes to all the Villa San staff.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I have really enjoyed being here with my friends and family. Everyday there is new adventures! This place is awesome! I don’t want to leave, it is like paradise here. You can get massage whenever you want. And the best part is, they have an awesome pool.

REVIEW.Name: Cindy Wilson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything was lovely. Thank you very much for the framed photos and for your lovely service. You make a wonderful place even more special. Your friendliness and helpfulness is exceptional. If one was to ask where is the best place to stay in Ubud,there would be no hesitation - Villa San.

REVIEW.Name: Journeys World
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Magical spot - felt like we were on a movie set. Everything amazing, staff incredible. Thank you for making us felt so welcome and relaxed. The massages were fabulous. Loved the yoga spot. Will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We really enjoyed our stay in Villa San. We appreciated the proximity of the villa from the center of Ubud. The swimming pool is really beautiful and enable to swim easily. The children were amazed to have such a sporting room. Thank you for the staff for their kindness. Looking forward to coming back in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We would like to thank all the team working at Villa San. All of them went the extra mile to make our stay extraordinary and truly unforgettable. All of you were great in every aspect, but especially helping us taking care of the kids, and for that we are ever so grateful. I don't think there is a better place to stay in Ubud.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a great first impression. Walking into such a well kept and huge villa! Wonderful location, wonderful staff in such a great country. Our first stay in Ubud despite numerous trips to Bali. Adi and the team made us feel very relaxed, welcomed and everything we requested was catered for. Our special Babi Guling dinner was totally amazing. We felt very special to experience such a tradition. Sad to be leaving and hopefully we’ll get to come back.

REVIEW.Name: IDRISS BACCOUCHE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Really good villa and service, actually one of the best experience ever in Bali. Thank you so much for your hospitality and for making our holidays amazing. Amazing team, amazing people. Adi number one!!!

REVIEW.Name: Piyush Desai
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the service. All staff was excellent. The food was very good and we all enjoy every meal. The villa is clean and well maintained. Perfect location for large group.

REVIEW.Name: Lovely Bali Villas Lovely Bali Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for your hospitality during our stay here. The villa is really great, well maintained and spacious. Lots of room for all the guests. The food were really delicious, and our dietary restrictions were met. We love it here and would definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's a good place here, the staff here really make it like a house. I like the passion and the feeling over here. Thank You.

REVIEW.Name: Pan Peter
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an wonderful week here at the villa. You’re made all of us feel extremely pampered, which makes the vacation really hand to end.

REVIEW.Name: Vanessa Harris
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to all the staff for an amazing stay at Villa San. Nothing was to much trouble, everything was done with a smile. Our final night dinner of Babi Guling was a highlight and the special decoration and lighting on the grass was completely unexpected and very much appreciated. We would recommended the villa to anyone who wanted a luxury, quiet, beautiful oasis to stay in. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Irene Zhang
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our family loved our stay at Villa San. The staff is very attentive and helpful, we truly felt at home since the moment we stepped onto your property. The villa is well maintenance and conveniently located . we would recommend this lovely place to anyone visiting Bali. Thank You.

REVIEW.Name: Thomas Djiwandono
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our first trip to Ubud with our children. Traveling and finding the right place to stay with an autistic son is always difficult. We are so glad that the staff are very kind and helpful and our son loves this place instantly. We are definitely going to stay here again on our next trip to Ubud !!!!

REVIEW.Name: Gail Shepherd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much to all the staff at Villa San for making us feel welcome and relaxed during our stay at this beautiful villa in Ubud. The villa is in a great location and all the staff were outstanding – nothing was too much trouble ! The food was so good that we want to take Made home with us. He is amazing along with Adi, Kuta, Mika and the wonderful ladies who looked after us also. We will be back. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Karen Patricia Conaghan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the staff at Villa San led by Adi, Kuta, and Delman. Thank you for your warm attentive hospitality. We felt very welcome from the moment we were greeted at the entrance of Villa San. Your attention to looking after us all was appreciated. Always smiling, respecting our privacy and anticipating our needs. Nothing was too much trouble for any of you and we so appreciated it. In particular your decoration and all you did for our birthday girl made our stay very special. We had a wonderful stay and so enjoyed our time in magical Ubud.

REVIEW.Name: Peter Wilkins
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were an extended family group of 10 gathered from different states in Australia to celebrate several significant birthdays this year. Villa San was a perfect setting to accommodate the varying needs of 8 adult and 2 small children. All the staff made a huge effort to make our stay special, including a birthday meal/barbecue set out on the grass with beautiful decorations and delicious food. We had a wonderful time and appreciate the efforts of all involved.

REVIEW.Name: Shani Maguire
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Just a perfect retreat for 9 tired mums looking to relax. Thanks so much for your hospitality. Wonderful food, setting and entertainment!

REVIEW.Name: Smailing Tour Bali Smailing Tour Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great time. The ambience was great. Adi was great!

REVIEW.Name: Paul Vincent Dwyer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thank you to all the staff at Villa San. Our group of 12 really enjoyed our stay. It's central location provided easy access to the delights of Ubud. The swimming pool was a real treat and provides good exercise. We would highly recommend Villa San to both a group of adult or families. Looking forward to next return.

REVIEW.Name: Jewel Indonesia Tour and Travel - PT Putra Sari Abadi Tour and Travel - Bali Wellness Retreat & Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making us feel at home in Bali and Ubud! Our stay here was really great- especially because of the two birthday cakes!. Your help with planning activities, the barbecue and Balinese dancing, and overall service of the lovely staff were highly appreciated. We are sad to go, but we will cherish the memories..

REVIEW.Name: Kadina Travel Kadina Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for looking after our family of 12 in your beautiful villa. If we ever return, we hope to stay with you again. Best asset is the wonderful staff.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came here on a team building vacation with 9 colleagues and our stay here was wonderful. Ubud is so beautiful and Villa San was an incredible place to stay. The staff were so kind to everyone and accommodating of the many different nationalities we had with us. We are so happy. We had the opportunity to stay here and will definitely remember this beautiful place. Thank you so much to the wonderful staff for making everything perfect.

REVIEW.Name: Prima Agung Wisata, PT.
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All of my family members like the villa very very much. All of the staff is perfect, kind and professional. We have two happy days here. A good view and comfortable sleep. We would like to come here for another holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Thierry, Charles, Jean-Marie Arduin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks Adi for everything, you were an amazing butler. All the best

REVIEW.Name: Tours Bali Barong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Adi and the rest of the staff for making our stay at Villa San so peaceful. Beautiful scenery, delicious food, and accommodating staff. When one family member got sick, the staff searched the supermarket for apple sauce, and upon finding none, made it homemade - how thoughtful! We will miss Villa San and appreciated all we learned about Balinese culture from Adi. Thank you for going above and beyond.

REVIEW.Name: Airbnb (15.5)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had such a good time staying in Bali in Villa San. We messed up several times and broke a few things but you were always smiling and willing to help up, so thank you for not getting tired of us. The team at the villa is amazing as well as the service. We wont forget these few days with you and we thank you for all your hard work, dedication and smiles! We wish you and everyone here the best. Thank you again. PS - Thank you for the cookies, french fries and pizza. They were delicious!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a fabulous holiday. My family and I loved the most wonderful escape. All my expectations have been surpassed. The property is amazing, I love the sculpture, art and space. The staff are beautiful, attentive, kind, helpful and made us feel so relaxed and looked after. I'm booking another stay.

REVIEW.Name: Claudia Bedard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the team at Villa San. We enjoyed our stay. The staff were very attentive. We had an amazing BBQ dinner in the garden. The foods was great and very tasty. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Amy Gould
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All staff members were extremely friendly. The pool was great because it was always nice and warm. Whenever we needed something - pool towel, drink or snack it was always offered or there. The rooms were very clean and the food was excellent. Finally, the massages were super relaxing and wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Manish Agarwal
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All staff were amazing, we got all our special requests without any problem. The meals were amazing and we had a great birthday party with the dance. Can't wait to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Travel Serv Co. Ltd.-Shanghai Beijing Zanadu International
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our first trip to Bali with our family. We arrived really late at night time around 3 o'clock, but the staff were still waiting for us in villa, and prepare the food for us. Also, the environment and the weather is excellent here, clean and comfortable. Our family do really enjoy staying in the villa rather than going outside. We are definitely going to stay in Villa San again next time when we come to Bali!

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for making our stay very relaxing. All staff are excellent, they ensure that no request is too hard. The service is impeccable. The villa is a dream to stay in and felt like home. Thank you for everything and we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to all staff. You're amazing, very kind and helpful. The villa was beautiful and well maintained. Looking forward to coming back in October this year.

REVIEW.Name: Farida Baker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff at Villa San were so nice. We were 3 families with 3 toddlers and 1 baby and they really tried their hardest to serve to their ever demanding needs. The place was very well maintained, lots of space for everyone. We will definitely come back to stay again.

REVIEW.Name: PURI ASIA ASIA
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Enjoyed villa with my group of 11 people, thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Felicia Dobler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent service and the most beautiful villa I've stayed in Bali. All is good - perfectly happy and calm feeling when I'm here. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Christine Indonet Travel, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I know this villa from my friend. All staff was very nice and awesome. The villa is very comfortable and in good location. Will be back again.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much. We all had a wonderful, relaxing stay at Villa San. A lovely calm oasis in the center of Ubud. The amazing staff and the beautiful grounds and accommodation exceeded our expectation. Thank you again for a memorable stay.

REVIEW.Name: Gaylene Marsden
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our celebration for Gaylene and Nadya so welcoming. Your hospitality and wonderful facilities have made our holiday just perfect. Also chefs and massage staff, topped off a wonderful break. See you next time.
